projects.title: Functional Application Specialist @ WML N.V.
projects.description:
Project Scope:
WML, which stands for Water supply company Limburg,  is the water supplier for all the households in the Dutch region Limburg, and the main supplier for over 15.000 companies in Limburg. WML is a public utility company and semi part of the Dutch government. The company is responsible for the quality of the supplied water, and therefore has several operators and technicians who provide 24-h service to their customers. WML also preventive check the water quality within companies and households.
WML uses several SAP solutions for their business processes. Ideo implemented mobile applications and the back-end system for the processes of the departments Production, Distribution and Inspection. It was build using the following applications: SAP PM/CS (EAM), MRS, SAP MAM, Ideo Mobile work management, Ideo Direct planning and Ideo Mobile forms. 
For a more convenient way of using MRS, they wanted a specific solution for automatically creating time specifications in the planning board.

Responsibilities:
Supporting the Application Management Team in the following areas:
•	SAP CS/PM
•	SAP MRS
•	SAP Mobile Asset Management
•	Process improvements
•	Testing activities
o	Unit testing
o	System Integration Test (SIT)
o	Supporting User Acceptance Tests (UAT)

contributors.headline: Streamlining Business Processes with Service and Asset management | Practice Lead SAP EAM | Managing Consultant

projects.title: Functional Application Specialist @ Vitens N.V.
projects.description:
Project Scope:
Vitens is the largest distributor of drinking water in the Netherlands. One of the  departments, SWITCH, is responsible for inspecting non-residence buildings on any possible contaminations of the national drinking water supply. Their inspection process starts from IS-U, from where the inspection order is created and scheduled via Clicksoftware’s planning tool, Clickschedule. This tool is used for planning and route optimization between the different addresses of the inspections. After this, the inspectors receive and report back their inspections via Ideo Mobile Forms.
The other department inspects waterworks on pollution from the individual connections. Therefore they use a SAP Mobile solution called WOM, based on Ideo Mobile Forms.

Responsibilities	:
Supporting the Application Management Team in the following areas:
•	SAP IS-U
•	SAP CS/PM
•	Clickschedule planning and optimization
•	Process improvements
•	Ideo Mobile Forms
•	SAP Mobile Platform
•	Testing activities
o	Unit testing
o	System Integration Test (SIT)
o	Supporting User Acceptance Tests (UAT)

contributors.headline: Streamlining Business Processes with Service and Asset management | Practice Lead SAP EAM | Managing Consultant

projects.title: SAP EAM (PM/CS) Support Consultant @ GGZ Vincent van Gogh Venray
projects.description:
Project Scope:
VvG is a Psychiatric hospital in Venray, the Netherlands. VvG wants to integrate their processes in one integrated IT system. They chose to use the CareCTRL suite based on SAP technology. The product CareCTRL is based on SAP ECC 6.0 and consists of the SAP modules: SAP portal for Customer Self-service and Manager Self-service, SAP EAM (CS/PM) notifications, service orders, functional locations, equipments and maintenance plans, MRS, SRM/MM purchasing, CATS and HR Personnel Administration.This solution is implemented in collaboration with PinkRoccade Healthcare. Ideo develops and implements the CareCTRL solution for maintenance processes.

Responsibilities:
Support consultancy and changes:
•	JAVA Webdynpro (CareCTRL Portal)
•	SAP CS/PM (EAM)
•	SAP ECC 6.0 integration with:
•	FICO
•	SRM/MM
•	HR

contributors.headline: Streamlining Business Processes with Service and Asset management | Practice Lead SAP EAM | Managing Consultant

projects.title: SAP EAM (PM/CS) Support Consultant @ AMC Hospital Amsterdam
projects.description:
Project Scope:
The AMC – Academic Medical Centre - is one of the largest hospitals, and situated in the capital of The Netherlands, Amsterdam. The AMC hospital provides medical care to their clients with the highest reachable quality. To achieve this quality, they innovate in the medical processes as well in their IT processes.
Because of de-centralized IT-systems and the wish to standardize work processes and integrate IT-systems the SAP based healthcare template CareCTRL was a logical choice.
The product CareCTRL is based on SAP ECC 6.0 and consists of the SAP modules: SAP portal for Customer Self-service and Manager Self-service, SAP EAM (CS/PM) notifications, service orders, functional locations, equipments and maintenance plans, MRS, SRM/MM purchasing, CATS and HR Personnel Administration.

Responsibilities:
Support consultancy and changes:
•	JAVA Webdynpro (CareCTRL Portal)
•	SAP CS/PM (EAM)
•	SAP MRS 7
•	SAP ECC 6.0 integration with:
•	FICO
•	SRM/MM
•	HR

projects.title: SAP EAM (PM/CS), MRS and Mobility Support Consultant @ RDW - Government
projects.description:
Project Scope:
RDW is a public service provider in the mobility chain. The Dutch government has assigned four main tasks to the  RDW: Licensing: the approval of vehicles and vehicle parts on the Dutch and European market ; Supervision & Control: enforcing legislation and regulations and supervising companies that carry out public tasks in the mobility chain ; Registration & Information Provision: registration of driving licenses and vehicles ; Issuing documents: issuing documents in the vehicle and driving license chain. The RDW is part of the Dutch government and one of the best respected partners in the European market. Ideo implemented several business processes using the following applications: SAP PM/CS (EAM), MRS, JAVA Webdynpro, Ideo Mobile work management and SAP CATS. Ideo delivers third line support on all those applications.

Responsibilities:
Support consultancy:
•	SAP CS/PM (EAM)
•	SAP MRS 8
•	SAP CATS
•	JAVA Webdynpro
•	Ideo MWM

projects.title: SAP Mobility Consultant @ Vitens N.V.
projects.description:
Project Scope:
Vitens is a utility company with 1.430 employees. Vitens works 24 hours a day, seven days a week to extract, purify and deliver top-quality drinking water because they know that 5.4 million people trust it implicitly. To inspect waterworks on pollution from the individual connections they use a SAP Mobile solution called WOM, based on Ideo Mobile Forms. This project is the implementation of the new WOM application.

Responsibilities:
Functional SAP Mobility consultant:
•	Design screen lay-outs from Functional Designs
•	Testing of the new application
•	Create manuals

projects.title: SAP EAM (PM/CS) Consultant @ RDW - Government
projects.description:
Project Scope:
RDW is a public service provider in the mobility chain. The Dutch government has assigned four main tasks to the  RDW: Licensing: the approval of vehicles and vehicle parts on the Dutch and European market ; Supervision & Control: enforcing 
legislation and regulations and supervising companies that carry out public tasks in the mobility chain ; Registration & Information Provision: registration of driving licenses and
vehicles ; Issuing documents: issuing documents in the vehicle and driving license chain.
The RDW is part of the Dutch government and one of the best respected partners in the European market. 
RDW has 16 inspection stations in The Netherlands for vehicle inspections. These stations work with SAP, implemented by Ideo. This solution is called “PAS”. Within this project, the third phase of the “PAS” applications is implemented. The third phase of the “PAS” applications consist of planning optimization, execution, registration, based on the SAP modules/applications: CS, MRS, Mobile Work Management, JAVA webdynpro and CATS.

Responsibilities:
Implementing the third phase of the PAS project:
•	Functional SAP consultant
•	SAP CS/PM (EAM)
•	SAP MRS 8
•	SAP CATS
•	JAVA Webdynpro
•	Integration with webservices 
•	Process analyses
•	Functional Design
•	Customizing 
•	Test the maintenance processing
•	Write customizing documentation
•	Migration
•	Go-live support

contributors.headline: Streamlining Business Processes with Service and Asset management | Practice Lead SAP EAM | Managing Consultant

projects.title: SAP EAM (PM/CS) Consultant @ RDW - Government
projects.description:
Project Scope:
RDW is a public service provider in the mobility chain. The Dutch government has assigned four main tasks to the  RDW: Licensing: the approval of vehicles and vehicle parts on the Dutch and European market ; Supervision & Control: enforcing 
legislation and regulations and supervising companies that carry out public tasks in the mobility chain ; Registration & Information Provision: registration of driving licenses and
vehicles ; Issuing documents: issuing documents in the vehicle and driving license chain.
The RDW is part of the Dutch government and one of the best respected partners in the European market.
This project is part of a bigger project, which is called PERMIT. In this project In this project Ideo implements the business process for the department TTV  (which stands for Admission and Control Vehicles) in SAP. This department is the only Dutch authority for admission of vehicles and vehicle-parts on the public roads. The TTV auditors check vehicles on the required safety and environmental aspects, on the location of the customer. 
In this phase of the project Ideo implemented the registration of approval numbers in SAP. RDW gives out approval numbers to their customers when their product is approved. The registration of this number is executed in another database than SAP and therefore there has to be build a connection between the number database and SAP, consisting: SAP CS/PM (EAM) and JAVA Webdynpro.

Responsibilities:
Overall responsible for the implementation:
•	Functional SAP consultant
•	SAP CS/PM (EAM)
•	JAVA Webdynpro
•	Integration with webservices
•	Creating functional designs
•	Coordinating developments
•	Creating master data
•	Customizing
•	Training Functional Application Managers
•	Training key-users
•	Creating user manuals 
•	Setting up test scripts
•	Coordinating unit and integration tests
•	Preparing acceptance tests
•	Issue solving

contributors.headline: Streamlining Business Processes with Service and Asset management | Practice Lead SAP EAM | Managing Consultant

projects.title: SAP EAM (PM/CS), MRS and Mobility Consultant @ Heidelberg (former Plantin/Tetterode)
projects.description:
Project Scope:
Plantin and Tetterode are a Staples company which provides products and service to the press, prepress and post press sector. Plantin is situated in Brussels (Belgium), and Tetterode in Almere (The Netherlands).
Ideo implemented SAP CS (Customer Service), SAP MRS (Multi Resource Scheduling), SAP MAM (Mobile Asset Management), SAP CATS and Ideo MWM. In a later stage their individual SAP systems are merged to one SAP instance.
The MAM version of Plantin and Tetterode is improved with several optimizations, back-end (SAP ECC 6.0) and front-end (SAP MAM).

Responsibilities:
Overall responsible for the implementation:
•	Functional SAP consultant
•	SAP CS/PM (EAM)
•	SAP MRS 7
•	SAP MAM
•	SAP CATS
•	Ideo MWM
•	Creating functional designs
•	Creating master data
•	Customizing
•	Set up autorisations
•	Setting up test scripts
•	Coordinating unit and integration tests
•	Preparing acceptance tests
•	Issue solving

projects.title: MS Access Consultant @ Philips Medical Healthcare
projects.description:
Project Scope:
Philips Medical Healthcare manufactures medical systems for imaging, radiation oncology and patient monitoring as well as providing information management and resuscitation products. They have companies throughout the entire world.
Every year all spare part prices in the SAP database have to be updated due to new exchange rates. This is done with SAP LSMW, with input of text files exported from MS Excel. To make this process faster and easier, Philips wants to export the files automatically. This is done with the following applications: SAP LSMW, Microsoft Access and SAP CS/PM (EAM).

Responsibilities:
Building the Access database:
•	Creating functional regarding the applications:
•	Microsoft Access
•	SAP LSMW
•	SAP CS/PM (EAM)
•	Build the Access database
•	Unit tested the database
•	Creating user manuals
•	Tested the migration with SAP LSMW 
•	Key-user training

contributors.headline: Streamlining Business Processes with Service and Asset management | Practice Lead SAP EAM | Managing Consultant

projects.title: SAP EAM (PM/CS), MRS and Mobility Consultant @ WML N.V.
projects.description:
Project Scope:
WML, which stands for Water supply company Limburg,  is the water supplier for all the households in the Dutch region Limburg, and the main supplier for over 15.000 companies in Limburg. WML is a public utility company and semi part of the Dutch government. The company is responsible for the quality of the supplied water, and therefore has several operators and technicians who provide 24-h service to their customers. WML also preventive check the water quality within companies and households.
WML uses several SAP solutions for their business processes. Ideo implemented mobile applications and the back-end system for the processes of the departments Production, Distribution and Inspection. It was build using the following applications: SAP PM/CS (EAM), MRS, SAP MAM, Ideo Mobile work management, Ideo Direct planning and Ideo Mobile forms. 
 Ideo implemented the Ideo Mobile work management solution, based on SAP Webdynpro. This project the Ideo Mobile Work Management solution is upgraded and enhanced, to fit the current work process of the water production department of WML. Also a new product is implemented in this project, Ideo Materials and services. This solution is used for goods movements and is implemented in a JAVA Webdynpro solution, based on SAP MM.

Responsibilities:

•	SAP MRS 7

•	Webdynpro
•	Ideo MWM
•	Ideo M&S

•	Setting up test scripts

•	Support during SIT / UAT

projects.title: SAP EAM (PM/CS), MRS and Mobility Consultant @ RDW - Government
projects.description:
Project Scope:
RDW is a public service provider in the mobility chain. The Dutch government has assigned four main tasks to the  RDW: Licensing: the approval of vehicles and vehicle parts on the Dutch and European market ; Supervision & Control: enforcing legislation and regulations and supervising companies that carry out public tasks in the mobility chain ; Registration & Information Provision: registration of driving licenses and vehicles ; Issuing documents: issuing documents in the vehicle and driving license chain. The RDW is part of the Dutch government and one of the best respected partners in the European market. Ideo implemented several business processes using the following applications: SAP PM/CS (EAM), MRS, JAVA Webdynpro, Ideo Mobile work management and SAP CATS.
This project is part of a bigger project, which is called PERMIT. In this project In this project Ideo implements the business process for the department TTV  (which stands for Admission and Control Vehicles) in SAP. This department is the only Dutch authority for admission of vehicles and vehicle-parts on the public roads. The TTV auditors check vehicles on the required safety and environmental aspects, on the location of the customer. 
In this phase of the project Ideo implemented a web-based Webdynpro screen, that is used by technicians, planners, managers and administration personnel. This screen displays the planning node for their department and can be used to view the planning from other departments. This information is displayed directly from SAP MRS to the Webdynpro.

Responsibilities:
Overall responsible for the implementation:
•	Functional SAP consultant
•	SAP MRS 8
•	JAVA Webdynpro
•	SAP CS/PM (EAM)
•	Creating functional designs
•	Creating master data
•	Customizing
•	Set up autorisations
•	Training Functional Application Managers
•	Setting up test scripts
•	Coordinating unit and integration tests
•	Issue solving

profile_positions.description: Training in SAP MM, SD, FI/CO, BI, Netweaver and ABAP as preparation on the actual Traineeship at Ideo B.V.
profile_positions.title: Traineeship SAP

profile_positions.description:
Development of manuals, modules and other training material. These materials are used by trainers and consultants to coach co-workers from all kind of companies, mostly manufactorers and warehouses.

- Member of the Works Council.
profile_positions.title: R&D
